snippet.title: Dust & Neon Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer | Inside the House of Indies: Holiday Event 2022
snippet.description:
You heard right! Dust & Neon is coming to Nintendo Switch!

Join the mysterious Gunslinger as he embarks upon an epic quest filled with twitch-trigger precision gunplay, armies of menacing robots, and incredible boss fights. If at first, you don’t succeed, try again with dozens of unlockable abilities, thousands of unique weapons and game-changing performance boosts, all of which transform your hero into an unstoppable force!

#gaming #roguelite #roguegames #indiegame
